name: Lopus AI
long_description:
Enterprise deals stall and die because scattered emails, siloed call transcripts, and hidden blockers force reps into constant firefights. Your deal teams burn hours reconstructing context instead of proactively closing revenueâ€”costing you millions.

We've built Lopus AI, an AI-powered Deal Intelligence platform that automatically surfaces hidden deal blockers, unifies every stakeholder interaction into actionable insights, and turns your team's best wins into repeatable playbooks.

Engineered by Lopus AI, the GTM weapons lab.
